entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
Democrat Joe Biden on President Trump correctly blaming China for lying to the world about coronavirus: 

“And so, I, I just don’t, and now he’s trying to play this China card, I mean, I don’t know wh-, I don’t know wh-, eh, eh this is an usual president” https://t.co/tu9xsy6dhG
